org.apache.nutch.indexer.geoip

Class GeoIPDocumentCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.indexer.geoip.GeoIPDocumentCreator

  • public class GeoIPDocumentCreator
extends Object

    Simple utility class which enables efficient, structured NutchDocument building based on input from GeoIPIndexingFilter, where configuration is also read.

    Based on the nature of the input, this class wraps factory type implementations for populating NutchDocument 's with the correct NutchField information.
